title: How to send an email in Gmail - Quora

response.answer_text: To send an email on Gmail follow the steps- Sign to your Gmail account.Click on the compose button found on the left-hand side.Enter the sender’s email address.If you want to know in detail click here -> How to Send an Email on Gmail.
You have to know the email address associated with the other Gmail account, then send an email just like any other email.
